head.title: Perform Case-Sensitive Searches in {{FileFormatUp}} with {{EnvNameShort}}
head.description: The {{ProdFullName}} API helps {{ProgLang}} developers run case-sensitive searches across multiple document types.

header.title: Case-Sensitive Document Search
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} allows you to implement precise case-sensitive search functionality in your {{EnvNameShort}} projects.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: Learn About {{ProdShortName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a versatile tool for text search and indexing across various documents. It supports over 70 formats like PDFs, Word files, Excel sheets, images, and ZIPs, enabling you to efficiently handle extensive datasets.

more_features.title: Enhanced Search and Indexing Tools
more_features.description: With {{ProdFullName}}, you can streamline document search and indexing for more than 70 formats, making it easier to locate and organize information.

feature_1.title: Flexible Text Search
feature_1.content: Search through documents such as PDFs, Word files, and spreadsheets with ease. Use tools like exact match, fuzzy search, and wildcard support to refine your results.

feature_2.title: Efficient Index Management
feature_2.content: Organize and index large datasets to improve search speed and performance when handling big document collections.

feature_3.title: Support for Global Languages
feature_3.content: Perform searches in more than 80 languages, accommodating different keyboard layouts and linguistic variations for better accuracy.

feature_4.title: Customizable Search Filters
feature_4.content: Adjust search criteria with options like case sensitivity, date range filtering, and exclusion of unwanted words or data during indexing.

formats.title: Supported File Formats for Searching
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} works with over 70 popular document formats, offering customizable search settings and efficient indexing.

operations.title: Key Features Overview
operations.description: Discover the robust and effective search capabilities offered by {{ProdFullName}}.

examples.comment_1: Define the location for the index storage
examples.comment_2: Point to the folder containing documents to search
examples.comment_3: Enable case-sensitive mode in the search settings

steps.title: Guide to Case-Sensitive Search in {{FileFormatUp}} Files

content.title: Using [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}), you can easily perform case-sensitive searches in {{FileFormatUp}} documents, enhancing your {{EnvName}} projects.
content.step_1: Set the folder for storing the search index.
content.step_3: Run the case-sensitive search and collect results.
content.step_4: Process and use the search results.

code_1.content: This example demonstrates how to implement case-sensitive searches for {{FileFormatUp}} documents.
